title: Structures in C++
subject: C++ Programming
theory:
Similar to C struct but can have Functions (Methods)! 
Sole difference from Class: Members are **Public** by default (Class members are Private by default).

interview_questions.question: Difference between struct and class in C++?
interview_questions.answer: Access specifiers. Struct defaults to Public. Class defaults to Private. Inheritance matches this default too.
